settings.label: Inquiries
settings.title: We Welcome Your Correspondence
settings.description: Whether you seek a bespoke commission, wish to arrange a private viewing, or have questions about our collections, our client relations team awaits your inquiry.

settings.question: Do you offer bespoke commissions?
settings.answer: Indeed. Our master craftsmen welcome the opportunity to create one-of-a-kind pieces tailored to your exact specifications. Please arrange a private consultation to discuss your vision.

settings.question: How may I arrange a private viewing?
settings.answer: Private viewings may be scheduled at any of our flagship ateliers. Contact our concierge team to arrange a personalized appointment at your convenience.

settings.question: What authentication accompanies each piece?
settings.answer: Every creation includes comprehensive certification of authenticity, detailed provenance documentation, and our lifetime guarantee of craftsmanship.

settings.question: Do you offer international delivery?
settings.answer: We provide secure, insured delivery worldwide through our trusted courier partners. White glove delivery service is available for significant acquisitions.

settings.title: Remain Informed
settings.text: Subscribe to receive exclusive invitations to private events, early access to new collections, and news from our atelier.
